page.title: 08Playground Games. 1
page.content: {Queeny Queeny.}You play Queeny Queeny with about six players and a ball. One person throws the ball over their head and the others have to catch it. They then hide the ball behind their backs and the person "up" tries to catch them out and guess who has the ball. {French Skipping.}You play French Skipping with three or more people. Two people hold the ends of an elastic loop while the others jump over it. {Doctor, Doctor.}This is played with three or more people. One person is the "doctor" while the others have to get themselves tangled up. The "doctor" has to untangle them. {Bulldog.}Bulldog is played with three or more people. One person is "it", the others stay in a den. The person who is "it" calls out someone's name. That person has to shout "Bulldog!" and everyone runs and is chased.
